item.title: Install Redis from Source
item.description: OS: RHEL Community Minimal AlmaLinux 8.x RockyLinux 8.x CentOS 7.9 prepare User set Firewall dependencies: $sudo dnf group install 'Development Tools' $sudo dnf install tcl wget v6+ Just to clarify: there is no way this issue will be fixed, Redis >= 6 will require a C11 compiler. RHEL7 sudo dnf install centos-release-scl sudo dnf install devtoolset-8 scl enable devtoolset-8 bash verification $gcc -v $make -v $echo 'puts [info patchlevel];exit 0' | tclsh installation $wget https://download.
